hero.title: Driven by the Sun.
hero.subtitle: We are redefining the future of agriculture through solar-first technology and autonomous sustainability.

mission.title: Our mission is to harmonize technology with the earth's natural rhythms.
mission.description: At Sun Enterprises, we believe the solution to global food security isn't just about planting more; it's about growing smarter. By harnessing the infinite energy of the sun, we power a new generation of farming equipment that leaves zero carbon footprint.

timeline.title: The Seed is Planted
timeline.description: Founded in a small garage in California, we began with a single goal: creating a solar-powered irrigation pump for local farmers.

timeline.title: First Solar-Agri Project
timeline.description: Launched the Helios-1, the world's first fully autonomous solar tractor, reducing operational costs by 60% for mid-sized farms.

timeline.title: AgriTech Innovation Award
timeline.description: Recognized by the World Economic Forum for our contributions to sustainable land management through satellite AI and solar sensors.

timeline.title: Global Expansion
timeline.description: Now operating in 14 countries, managing over 1 million hectares with zero-emission technology.
